2.question: What is the main goal of this AI ?

3.question: What this AI will improve ? Who will benefit this ?

4.question: Who is participating during the AI creation ?

5.question: Why do you need this AI ?

6.question: Can you reach the same goal without AI ? If yes, why AI is better for this problem ?

7.question: Which decisions will be taken with the output of this AI ?

8.question: Who will be affected by this AI ?

9.question: How users will respond to this AI : Define questions that users may asked at the end about the AI prediction.

10.question: What is the type of AI ?

11.question: Do you need this AI to be train regularly ? How often ?

12.question: Which evaluation function will you use ? If binary classifier wieght on positive or negative ?

13.question: Using this evaluation method, do you think with time, it will affect prediction and be biased ?

14.question: Define success metrics : how will you say your AI is succeeding in what it was build for ?

15.question: Define negative metrics : how will you say your AI is failing in what it was build for ?

16.question: What are the data that you’ll need to build this AI ? (precise source type if possible and if you have it or you need to collect it)

17.question: Do you know if your data is reliable ? If no how will you say it can be reliable (see data quality section)

18.question: What feature extract from the data are important to be used for the prediction ?
